definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: It is another meaning that foster parents bring up the one .
sentences.chinese: 义父义母对他的养育又是另一层含义。

definition: adoptive mother (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
lord/master/young gentleman/male prostitute/catamite/mahjong player disqualified by unintentionally taking in the wrong number of dominoes/(old form of address for one's husband) husband
elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
uncle (affectionate name for a friend older than one's father)/old friend
